title: Electrochemical cells composite cathodes comprising cationic polymers and electroactive polysulfide compounds

events.title: Application filed by Sion Power Corp

classifications.description: Selection of substances as active materials, active masses, active liquids
Rocking-chair batteries, i.e. batteries with lithium insertion or intercalation in both electrodes; Lithium-ion batteries
Conductors or conductive bodies characterised by the conductive materials; Selection of materials as conductors mainly consisting of other non-metallic substances organic substances
Polymeric materials, e.g. gel-type or solid-type

Selection of substances as active materials, active masses, active liquids of inorganic compounds other than oxides or hydroxides, e.g. sulfides, selenides, tellurides, halogenides or LiCoFy; of polyanionic structures, e.g. phosphates, silicates or borates
Selection of substances as active materials, active masses, active liquids of organic compounds
Electrodes based on inorganic compounds other than oxides or hydroxides, e.g. sulfides, selenides, tellurides, halogenides or LiCoFy
Carbonaceous material, e.g. graphite-intercalation compounds or CFx for inserting or intercalating light metals

abstract: The present invention pertains to solid composite cathodes which comprise (a) an electroactive sulfur-containing cathode material which, in its oxidized state, comprises a polysulfide moiety of the formula, -Sm-, wherein m is an integer from 3 to 10; and (b) a cationic polymer comprising quaternary ammonium salt groups. The present invention also pertains to electric current producing cells comprising such solid composite cathodes, and methods of making such solid composite cathodes and electric current producing cells.
claims:
1. solid composite cathode that is used for producing the battery of electric current, said solid composite cathode comprises:
      (a) a kind of sulfur-bearing electroactive material under its oxidation state contains structural formula and is-S
          m-the polysulfide part, wherein m is 3～10 integer; With
        
      (b) a kind of cationic polymer that contains quaternary ammonium salt group.

2. the solid composite cathode of claim 1, the wherein said cationic polymer that contains quaternary ammonium salt group is to be selected from following one group of group:
      Quaternized salt, poly dimethyl propyl group ammonium salt, polymethyl acyl-oxygen ethyl-trimethyl ammonium salt and the polymethyl acyl-oxygen ethyl dimethyl ethoxy ammonium salt of the copolymerization salt of copolymerization salt, diallyl dimethyl ammonium and the N hydroxymethyl acrylamide of copolymerization salt, diallyl dimethyl ammonium and the acetylacetone,2,4-pentanedione of poly-(diallyl dimethyl ammonium) salt, diallyl dimethyl ammonium and acrylamide, polyvinyl benzyl trimethyl ammonium salts class, poly-table chlorhydrin and Trimethylamine.
3. the solid composite cathode of claim 1, the wherein said cationic polymer that contains quaternary ammonium salt group is poly-(diallyl dimethyl ammonium) salt.
4. the solid composite cathode of claim 1, the copolymerization salt that the wherein said cationic polymer that contains quaternary ammonium salt group is diallyl dimethyl ammonium and acrylamide.
5. the solid composite cathode of claim 1, wherein the electronegative hydrochlorate of said cationic polymer is the anion of unit price.

6. the solid composite cathode of claim 1, wherein the electronegative acid group of said cationic polymer is to be selected from following one group of group: BF
          4 -, B (phenyl)
          4 -, CF
          3SO
          3 -, (CF
          3SO
          2)
          2N
          -, PF
          6 -, AsF
          6 -, ClO
          4 -, CH
          3SO
          3 -, (CF
          3SO
          2)
          3C
          -, Cl
          -, Br
          -, I
          -,

7. the solid composite cathode of claim 1, wherein the electronegative acid group of said cationic polymer is BF
          4 -

8. the solid composite cathode of claim 1, wherein the electronegative acid group of said cationic polymer is CF
          3SO
          3 -

9. the solid composite cathode of claim 1, wherein the electronegative acid group of said cationic polymer is (CF
          3SO
          2)
          2N
          -

10. the solid composite cathode of claim 1, wherein the electronegative acid group of said cationic polymer is Cl
          -
11. the solid composite cathode of claim 1, wherein said sulfur-bearing electroactive material comprises element sulphur.
12. the solid composite cathode of claim 1, wherein said sulfur-bearing electroactive material comprises carbon sulphur polymer.
13. the solid composite cathode of claim 12, wherein m is an integer of 6～10.

14. the solid composite cathode of claim 12, wherein said structural formula is-S
          m-polysulfide partly be by one or two end sulphur atom on pendant groups, be connected on covalent bond on the main polymer chain of said carbon sulphur polymer.

15. the solid composite cathode of claim 12, wherein said structural formula is-S
          m-polysulfide partly be to connect with covalent bond by two end sulphur atoms to be inserted on the main polymer chain of said carbon sulphur polymer.
16. the solid composite cathode of claim 12, wherein said carbon sulphur polymer contain the above sulphur of 75% weight.
17. the solid composite cathode of claim 1, wherein said composite cathode also contains the non-cationic polymeric binder.

18. comprising, the solid composite cathode of claim 17, wherein said non-cationic polymeric binder be selected from following one group non-cationic polymeric binder: poly(ethylene oxide), PPOX, polyethers, polyimides, polyphosphazene, polyacrylonitrile, cellulose and urethanes.
19. the solid composite cathode of claim 17, wherein said non-cationic polymeric binder comprises poly(ethylene oxide).
20. the solid composite cathode of claim 17, wherein said non-cationic polymeric binder comprises hydroxyethylcellulose.
21. the solid composite cathode of claim 17, the weight ratio of wherein said non-cationic polymeric binder and cationic polymer binding agent is 0.25: 1～1: 1.

22. the solid composite cathode of claim 1, wherein said composite cathode also contain one or more and are selected from following one group conductive additive: conductive carbon, graphite, activated carbon fiber, sheet metal, metal dust, metallic fiber, conducting polymer and conducting metal chalcogenide.
23. the solid composite cathode of claim 1, wherein said composite cathode also includes electrolyte.

24. also including, the solid composite cathode of claim 1, wherein said composite cathode be selected from following one group non-electroactive metal oxide: silicon dioxide, aluminium oxide, silicate and titanium oxide.

25. a battery that produces electric current comprises:
      (a) anode;
      (b) solid composite cathode according to claim 1; With
      (c) a kind of electrolyte that is placed between said anode and the negative electrode.

26. the battery of claim 25, wherein said anode contain one or more and are selected from following one group material: lithium metal, aluminium lithium alloy, tin lithium alloy, mix the carbon of lithium and mix the graphite of lithium.

27. the battery of claim 25, wherein said electrolyte contain one or more and are selected from following one group material: liquid electrolyte, gum polymers electrolyte and solid polymer electrolyte.

28. the battery of claim 25, wherein said electrolyte contains:
      (a) one or more are selected from following one group polymer: polyethers, poly(ethylene oxide), PPOX, polyimides, polyphosphazene, polyacrylonitrile, polysiloxanes; The derivative of above-mentioned substance; The copolymer of above-mentioned substance; The mixture of above-mentioned substance; With
      (b) one or more ionic electrolyte salts.

29. the battery of claim 25, wherein said electrolyte contains:
      (a) one or more are selected from following one group electrolyte solvent: N-methylacetamide, acetonitrile, carbonic ester, sulfolane, sulfone class, N-alkyl pyrrolidone, dioxolanes, glyme and siloxanes; With
      (b) one or more ionic electrolyte salts.

30. a method that forms solid composite cathode, wherein said method comprises the steps:
      (a) in liquid medium, sulfur-bearing electroactive material and the cationic polymer that contains quaternary ammonium salt group are dispersed or dissolved, described sulfur-bearing electroactive material under its oxidation state contains structural formula and is-S
          m-the polysulfide part, wherein m is 3～10 integer;
        
      (b) will cast on the suitable matrix by the compound of step (a) gained or will be placed in the mould by the compound of step (a) gained; With
      (c) will partly or entirely remove by the liquid in the compound of step (b) gained, with solid or the gluey composite cathode that required form or form are provided.

31. a method that forms the battery that produces electric current, said method comprises:
      (a) provide an anode;
      (b) provide a solid composite cathode according to claim 1; With
      (c) between said anode and said negative electrode, put into electrolyte.
